nodes.id: 中华人民共和国外交部办公厅

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国外交部办公厅
en: General Office of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 由中华人民共和国外交部直接领导的工作机关。
description.en: A working organ directly led by the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国外交部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国外交部
en: Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国主管外交事务的国务院组成部门。
description.en: The department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China that is responsible for foreign affairs.

description.zh-cn: 中国外交官，现任中华人民共和国外交部办公厅主任。
description.en: Chinese diplomat, currently serving as the Director of the General Office of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国外交官，现任中华人民共和国外交部办公厅副主任。
description.en: Chinese diplomat, currently serving as a Deputy Director of the General Office of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国外交官，现任中华人民共和国外交部办公厅副主任。
description.en: Chinese diplomat, currently serving as a Deputy Director of the General Office of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国外交官，现任中华人民共和国外交部办公厅副主任。
description.en: Chinese diplomat, currently serving as a Deputy Director of the General Office of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国外交官，现任中华人民共和国外交部办公厅副主任。
description.en: Chinese diplomat, currently serving as a Deputy Director of the General Office of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国务院

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院
en: State Council of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国中央人民政府，是最高国家权力机关的执行机关，是最高国家行政机关。
description.en: The Central People's Government of the People's Republic of China, which is the executive body of the highest organ of state power and the highest state administrative organ.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的首都、直辖市、国家中心城市及超大城市。
description.en: The capital of the People's Republic of China, a direct-administered municipality, a national central city, and a megacity.

description.zh-cn: 中国外交官，曾任中华人民共和国外交部办公厅主任。
description.en: Chinese diplomat, formerly served as the Director of the General Office of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国外交官，曾两度担任中华人民共和国外交部办公厅主任。
description.en: Chinese diplomat, served twice as the Director of the General Office of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国外交官，曾任中华人民共和国外交部办公厅主任。
description.en: Chinese diplomat, formerly served as the Director of the General Office of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the People's Republic of China.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国外交部办公厅
relationships.target: 中华人民共和国外交部

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国外交部办公厅是由中华人民共和国外交部直接领导的工作机关。
description.en: The General Office of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs is a working body under the direct leadership of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the People's Republic of China.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国国务院
relationships.target: 中华人民共和国外交部办公厅

description.zh-cn: 外交部办公厅主要按照国务院和外交部给其确定的工作范围负责办理各项工作。
description.en: The General Office of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs is mainly responsible for handling various tasks in accordance with the scope of work determined by the State Council and the Ministry of Foreign Affairs.
